title: How to Unlock All Characters in SAKURA School Simulator: The Ultimate Guide
review_html:
Introduction

SAKURA School Simulator, a quirky life-simulation game developed by Garusoft Development Inc., has captivated players with its open-world sandbox mechanics and anime-inspired aesthetics. Set in Sakura Town, the game allows players to explore relationships, combat scenarios, and chaotic events through 30+ unique characters. Unlocking these characters isn't just cosmetic – protagonists like Mecha Robot (unlocked after defeating 50 enemies) or Vampire Queen (accessible via midnight cemetery events) offer distinct abilities that reshape gameplay dynamics.

Part 1: Character Overview

Core Characters

  • Kagura (Default): Balanced stats for beginners
  • Shin (Unlocked after 3 completed dates): Special combat buffs
  • Yuzu (Complete 'Library Mystery' quest): Stealth abilities

Secondary Characters

  • Delivery Bot (Purchase from in-game store for 500 coins)
  • Festival Dancer (Available during Tanabata events)
 

Part 2: Unlocking Methods

  1. Progression-Based Unlocks:
    • Complete 'Alien Invasion' storyline to access UFO Pilot role
    • 72% of characters require specific quest chains
  2. In-Game Currency:
    • Earn coins through:
      • Daily login bonuses (50-200 coins)
      • Mini-games (Up to 300 coins/hr)
      • Ad watches (25 coins/view)
  3. Time-Sensitive Unlocks:
    • 2023 Christmas Event introduced Snow Fairy character
    • Follow @SAKURA_Dev on Twitter for real-time updates

Part 3: Step-by-Step Guides

Hidden Character: Ghost Chef

  1. Reach Cooking Skill Level 5
  2. Visit abandoned restaurant at 3 AM game time
  3. Defeat 3 phantom customers in cooking minigame

Part 4: Pro Tips

  • Use Kagura to farm coins faster (15% earnings boost)
  • Save before attempting rare spawn characters (5% appearance rate)

FAQ

Q: Can transferred save files retain unlocked characters?
A: Only cloud-saved data through official servers preserves progress.

Conclusion

Mastering character unlocks transforms SAKURA School Simulator from casual play to strategic sandbox mastery. Regular game updates (last patch v2.3.1) continue expanding roster possibilities.

Resources

  • Official APK: SAKURA School Simulator
  • Community Discord: 15K+ members sharing spawn codes
